data.eml:eml: Taxonomic notes on the genera Brypoctia Schoorl, 1990 and Schreiteriana Fletcher & Nye, 1982 (Lepidoptera, Cossidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Penco, Fernando C., Yakovlev, Roman V., Witt, Thomas J. (2016): Taxonomic notes on the genera Brypoctia Schoorl, 1990 and Schreiteriana Fletcher & Nye, 1982 (Lepidoptera, Cossidae). Zootaxa 4205 (3): 297-300, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4205.3.10
